about_the_game:
Take your RPG team spelunking with this cave and mine tileset! Whether you’re looking for rare jewels in the depths of the earth or taking the “shortcut” to the other side of the mountain range, you’ll find a ton of goodies here for designing interesting underground labyrinths.

The Motherlode Cave & Mine Tileset includes:

Ground Tiles:

water, purple water, and lava
multiple colors and textures of dirt, great for layering!
wood floor
concrete floor
grates
wood fences and tables
gold vein
diamond vein
coal vein
autotile mushrooms
moss
small gold and crystal autotile
gravel
holes and spike trap

Wall Tiles:

walls to match floors, plus rusty metal walls and grates

Also featuring:

several styles of stairs
ladders
alternate fence with planks
mine carts and tracks
cones and warning signs
support structures
dynamite and barrels
gold bricks
mining accessories (picks, wheelbarrows, lights, etc)
lots of crates
prison setup
pipe structures
lanterns and cables
garbage skip
grates, rebar, rails, etc
rocks of many sizes, stalactites and stalagmites
small and large diamond crystals
big gold boulders and smaller nuggets
coal chunks
texture and cracks for walls and floor
driftwood and trees
moss (walls and floor)
mushrooms (floor and walls)
glowing orbs
angled walls
rugged cave doors


Events and Animations

mine carts
cell doors in several sizes
elevator door
lever (two styles)

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
